Medium: Eighty-one 35mm black and white slides (continuous loop), carousel slide projector, and miniature Plexiglas screen
Dimensions: Installation: 63 x 11 x 24" (160 x 27.9 x 61 cm)
CreditLine: Gift of The Contemporary Arts Council of The Museum of Modern Art and Committee on Media and Performance Art Funds
Title: Miniature in Black and White
